overview: Anthahpuram is a 1998 Telugu film directed by Krishna Vamsi. Prakash Raj, Soundarya and Jagapati Babu  star in prominent roles. The film won three Filmfare Awards South for Best Film, Best Director and Best Actress. The film also went on to win the Nandi Award for Best Supporting Actor for Jagapati Babu and the Nandi Award for Best Female Playback Singer for S. Janaki.
title: Anthahpuram
